column4: hi, this isnt really specific ubuntu, but its only happened to me in ubuntu, I'm using mplayer-plugin to watch videos in firefox, they work fine, BUT i cant seem to go fullscreen, it just keeps it 1:1 and adds a big black border, same thing in mplayer standalone, any ideas??
make sure you are using 'xv' as the video output
thanks man, that fixed it in the standalone, still no joy with mplayer-plugin, but this is much better :D
there are settings for the plug-in too, /etc/mplayerplug-in.conf iirc
